gobblin.util.limiter

Class RestliServiceBasedLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.util.limiter.RestliServiceBasedLimiter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Limiter

    public class RestliServiceBasedLimiter
extends Object
implements Limiter
    A Limiter that forwards permit requests to a Rest.li throttling service endpoint.
